page.title: 07Farming.
page.content: There are several farms in our area. Mr. Langrish owns{Castle {Farm.}He has {370 acres of land.}He has{1000 ewes}and about{120 cattle. Mr. Langrish has also a lot of small livestock, including a donkey and some geese. Most farmers around Rye go to Rye market to sell their livestock,but some do go to Ashford too. The farms around Rye Harbour are mostly sheep farms. The soil is sandy and there is a lot of shingle too, so a lot of{maize is grown.{Swedes}and{Kale}are also grown. Kale is a cabbage_like plant which is grown for feeding animals. By Rye Harbour Nature Reserve there are a lot of{Oil Seed Rape}crops. Rape is a very bright yellow colour and is grown for oil. { * * * * * * * * *
